actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the current law deduction for contributions to individual retirement accounts should not be reduced as a part of tax reform.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the current tax deduction for contributions to individual retirement accounts should not be reduced as part of any tax reform legislation.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the current law deduction for contributions to individual retirement accounts should not be reduced as a part of tax reform.
